title: gpu question
body:

my gpu is GeForce gtx1060 6g,and allready updated the newest driver.
but when I training the model,it says:”warning!! you are using 2gb gpu”
I pretty sure my gpu is 6gb.
How can I solve this problem?thanks.
my system: 
window10 
cuda10.1 
deepfacelab10.1avx(6/20)
